regular.query: It's time to take your morning medications. Take all medications as directed by your physician
regular.requery: Did you take your morning medications?
regular.details: Amlodipine, Aspirin, Atorvastatin, Hydrochlorothiazide, Levothyroxine, Losartan and Aldactone

regular.query: It is time to perform your home exercise program.
regular.requery: Did you perform your exercise routine that you were supposed to do at 1 PM?
regular.details: Perform your exercise routine as described by your physical therapist.

regular.query: It's the time to do an ECG. Do you want to try it now?
regular.requery: Did you do the ECG that you were supposed to do at 3 PM?
regular.details: Press the crown twice to go to Apps, tap on the ECG app, and follow the instructions.

contextual.query: It's time to wash your hands.
contextual.details: Follow the guidelines by World Health Organization

contextual.query: Don't forget to wear your masks when going outside.

contextual.requery: Did you try some in-home activities?
contextual.details: Try some exercise at home, or talk to your family and friends, or try preparing some healthy foods
